tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TicketRefundsAndExchanges (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    ticket_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    purchase_date DATE NOT NULL,
    refund_status BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    exchange_status BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
);

CREATE TABLE ticket_refunds (
    refund_id VARCHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY,
    ticket_id VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    refund_amount DECIMAL(8,2),
    refund_date TIMESTAMP,
    refund_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ticket_exchanges (
    exchange_id VARCHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY,
    original_ticket_id VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    new_ticket_id VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    exchange_date TIMESTAMP,
    exchange_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ticket_orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  order_date DATE,
  ticket_type VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE TicketTransactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ticket_id INT,
  transaction_date DATE,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(255),
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Tickets (
  ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ticket_number VARCHAR(50),
  ticket_date DATE,
  ticket_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  ticket_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE RefundRequests (
  request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  ticket_id INT,
  request_date DATE,
  refund_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ExchangeHistory (
  exchange_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  original_ticket_id INT,
  new_ticket_id INT,
  exchange_date DATE,
  exchange_reason TEXT
);
